title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Whisk eggs and Pecorino Romano in a bowl.
Mix hot pasta with guanciale and egg mixture off the heat.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked.
Cook tomatoes and spices into a sauce.
Stir in cream for a rich base.
Add chicken to sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Crispy toasted bread topped with mashed avocado, lemon juice, and chili flakes.
instructions: Mash avocado with lemon juice and salt.
